title: Unsupervised Paul Tries to Challenge Athenian Assumptions about What They Mean by God
description:
Paul keeps getting shown the door in these Greek cities and so finally he winds up in Athens leaving Silas and Timothy in Berea. Unsupervised Paul then not only starts doing what he does in the Synagogue, but also begins challenging the Athenian assumptions about the nature of the world that moves our own.

Discord link. Good for just a few days. Check with more recent videos for a fresh link. https://discord.gg/gmZ8xfgx
